# Discord Captcha

Discord Captcha is a library design to add captcha verification on your bot as easily as possible.

__Example :__

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/562743375179022526/657704612509515806/unknown.png)

__Usage :__

```js
const discord = require('discord.js');
const client = new discord.Client();

const discord_captcha = require('discord_captcha');                 // 1 line
const captcha_manager = new discord_captcha.Manager(client);        // 2 lines

client.on('ready', async () => {
    captcha.init('guild id', 'member\'s role', 'welcome message');  // 3 lines
});

// Only three lines required to implement DiscordCaptcha !
```
